title: Layout broken in Kafka Streams dev console topology view
body:
### Describe the bug

If you have larger topologies, the rendered graph is shifted to the bottom, with lots of empty space at the top of the graph.

![Screenshot_2021-10-27 Apache Kafka Streams › Topology kstreams-fk-join-aggregator 1 0 0-SNAPSHOT](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28612/139215720-d07f643e-8583-4bd0-8bda-d076735f1ec1.png)

Note how this shows only the lower half of the text box on the left-hand side but the upper half of the rendered graph. 
Another image of the full page (ignore the black bar in the middle, that's an artifact from screenshotting in Firefox):

![Screenshot_2021-10-28 Apache Kafka Streams › Topology kstreams-fk-join-aggregator 1 0 0-SNAPSHOT](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28612/139216665-e259a8a0-67e4-4189-91d2-4897aced1c98.png)

This can be observed by running this example: https://github.com/debezium/debezium-examples/tree/main/kstreams-fk-join.

### Expected behavior

Align text box and graph at the top.
